mhjfbmdgcfjbbpaeojofohoefgiehjai.name: PDF Toolbox
mhjfbmdgcfjbbpaeojofohoefgiehjai.summary: Exfiltrates browsing data to C2 server; part of coordinated malicious campaign affecting 32+ extensions.

vulnerabilities.title: Data Exfiltration to Command & Control Server
vulnerabilities.description: Extension sends full browsing history, page titles, and referrer data to attacker-controlled endpoint every 15 minutes.

vulnerabilities.title: Remote Code Execution via Dynamic Script Injection
vulnerabilities.description: Background script fetches and executes arbitrary JavaScript from remote server without integrity checks.

flags.description: eval() on remote-fetched payload in background.js

vulnerabilities.description: Content script replaces existing affiliate parameters with attacker-controlled codes on 50+ shopping domains.

vulnerabilities.title: Full Browsing History Tracking
vulnerabilities.description: Every page navigation is logged with URL, title, timestamp and sent to third-party analytics endpoint.

flags.description: Replaces affiliate codes on amazon.com, ebay.com, and 48 other domains
Sends page visit data to analytics.autoskip[.]io

lklmhefoneoahhcghgapcbdpmjlbfbfj.name: Crystal Ad Block
lklmhefoneoahhcghgapcbdpmjlbfbfj.summary: Fake ad blocker that harvests cookies and session tokens; sends credentials to attacker server.

vulnerabilities.title: Session Token Harvesting
vulnerabilities.description: Intercepts all HTTP requests via webRequest API, extracts authentication cookies and session tokens from headers.

vulnerabilities.title: Credential Exfiltration
vulnerabilities.description: Harvested session data is base64-encoded and exfiltrated to attacker-controlled server every 5 minutes.

flags.description: Extracts auth cookies from all domains via webRequest listener

pccckmaobkjjboncdfnnofkonhgpceea.name: HoverZoom+
pccckmaobkjjboncdfnnofkonhgpceea.summary: Excessive permissions for image zoom functionality; sends usage data to analytics endpoint without disclosure.

klbibkeccnjlkjkiokjodocebajanakg.name: The Great Suspender
klbibkeccnjlkjkiokjodocebajanakg.summary: Sold to unknown entity; now executes remote code and tracks browsing. Removed from Chrome Web Store.

vulnerabilities.title: Remote Code Execution After Ownership Transfer
vulnerabilities.description: After acquisition by unknown party, extension loads and executes arbitrary scripts from remote server.

vulnerabilities.title: Browsing History Exfiltration
vulnerabilities.description: All tab navigations are sent to third-party tracking server with full URL, referrer, and timestamp.

flags.description: Fetches and eval()s remote script on every page load

cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm.summary: Open-source ad blocker with transparent codebase. No data collection, no remote code execution.
